about_the_game:
Prepare for an epic naval showdown like never before in Battleshots: Chaos Edition – the ultimate battleship board-style game with a thrilling twist! Engage in fierce naval combat with up to 8 players at once, as you command your fleet to victory in the high seas.

Strategize, plot, and maneuver your ships across the game board, carefully targeting your opponent's vessels while safeguarding your own. But beware, for every attack you make could be influenced by unpredictable random events that shake up the traditional gameplay dynamics.

Navigate through treacherous waters where sudden storms, rogue waves, or unexpected reinforcements can turn the tide of battle in an instant. Adapt your tactics on the fly as you contend with ever-changing conditions and rival captains vying for supremacy.

With customizable fleets and a plethora of random events, Battleshots: Chaos Edition will offer endless replayability and excitement for both seasoned commanders and newcomers alike. Will you emerge as the undisputed master of the seas, or will you sink beneath the waves? The fate of the fleet is in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
